titleText: REVIEW: The new $500 Xbox One is incredibly powerful and far too expensive

titleText: Satya Nadella's weakness shows he's human like the rest of us
mainText: Satya Nadella grew up in the southern Indian city of Hyderabad and studied engineering at the Manipal Institute of Technology, before moving to the US and finding his way to the corner office at Microsoft.
